text: Boytes' zhe Allakha, proyavlyaya rveniye i ne zhaleya sil, sleduyte Yego nastavleniyam, ispolnyayte Yego poveleniya, raskhoduyte iz togo, chem On vas nadelil, na ugodnyye Yemu tseli i vershite dobro na blago sebe. A kogo izbavit Allakh ot skuposti yego dushi i yeyo stremleniya k uvelicheniyu imushchestva, te stanut schastlivymi
